summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1973, for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Highland Drive, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, with all appurtenances necessary for the proper drainage and sewerage of said district, under Ordinance No. 20378, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
